description:
This is an Excel training program with an effort to put live practicals experience in the form of videos. This course will taught you thoroughly on how to manage important tools in Excel and how to apply various functions with nested methodology. it is advisable that you must follow the structure pattern for better understanding.

What can be expected?

At the end of the course you will be able to handle data in excel, also will be able to apply text, logical, math, lookup & reference functions very easily. you will find it easy to manage organizing tools in Excel like charts, pivot table etc.

Who should do this?

If you work on Excel and found it difficult to apply advance functions and tools then this is must course for you. Candidate must have basic computer knowledge and should be aware of Excel environment. 

Even though the course which is up right now will be sufficient but every week I will keep on adding more videos.
title: Excel Training in Hindi
